instruction: Describe a tale told through spoken words between a thief caught by the person they stole from.
response:
“Is this seat taken?”
“Only if you promise to stay.”
“I wasn’t planning to.”
“Then I’ll wait anyway.”

instruction: Write a micro-story composed of dialogue about two friends reconciling after years apart.
response:
“Why did you leave?”
“Because you told me to.”
“I didn’t mean it.”
“You never do.”

instruction: Share a tale told through spoken words between an astronaut and mission control during crisis.
response:
“Why did you leave?”
“Because you told me to.”
“I didn’t mean it.”
“You never do.”

instruction: Write a micro-story composed of dialogue about two strangers stuck in an elevator.
response:
“You really don’t remember me?”
“Should I?”
“You promised you wouldn’t forget.”
“Then I already broke it.”

response:
